scenario_text.value: Oh no! She’s in such bad shape!
Wait, Miu! You shouldn’t move her!
Ah...ahh... Lady Miu...
Hold on, we’re here to rescue you!
Can we...do anything for injuries like this?
...I don’t think so.

Lady Miu... Thank you...so much for coming...
Hurry, run away...

What’re you saying?! You have to come with
us...
Miu... You should listen to her last words.
Her...last words?
I... I’m so happy I met you...Lady...Miu...
Wait, I...
We were too late...
I don’t believe it... *sniff* Nngh...
Miu...

*hic* I’m...I’m okay. It’s so, so sad, but...
there’ll be time for crying later.

Right now we have to save as many of them as
we can!
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right.
Amazing, Miu. You’ve gotten so strong.
Shakomon, everyone...let’s go!
